entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries or periods of drizzle beginning this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries or periods of drizzle ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle or rain showers. Fog patches. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of drizzle. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 21 April 2023
